name: Primary Color Man: Rule of Thirds
name_original: Primary Color Man: Rule of Thirds
description:
There are rumors on the internet about an entity known as Primary Color Man (PCM) that is known to wander abandoned schools, day cares, and other learning facilities. His goal is unknown, but there is one thing Blair, Reggie, and Yale will learn is that he doesn't like trespassers.

The Characters:

Reggie Gorria (27)
Came to the school for his urban exploring channel. Blair Blau (24)
Came to this school because her car broke down. Yale Gold (12) Came to this school because of a bet.

Controls:

Arrow keys or mouse click to move.

Interact with z or left click

Cancel with x or right click 

This game has 3 endings (4 if you count the game over screen) 

This game is made for the Primary Color Man game jam. The character of Primary Color man is made by Leovincible. https://twitter.com/leovincible 

Events and persons in this story are fictional and any resemblance to real life persons  is coincidental.
